Package edu.rice.starvote.drivers

Provides classes for interfacing with hardware devices used by the ballot box on the Raspberry Pi 3 platform.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDiverter
    Interface for a controller module that diverts a ballot to one of two paths.
    IMotor
    Interface for a bidirectional variable speed motor controller.
    IPWMDriver
    Interface for a pulse width modulation (PWM) controller.
    IScanner
    Interface for a code scanner controller.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiverterPWM
    Diverter servo control using a generic IPWMDriver.
    DiverterPython Deprecated
    PrinterMotor
    Reference implementation of the feed motor controller, driving the main motor in an HP 1010 printer.
    PWMBlaster
    Implementation of PWM controller using pi-blaster.
    PWMPython Deprecated
    Scan
    Implementation of scanner controller that invokes an external C scan program.

Package edu.rice.starvote.drivers Description

Provides classes for interfacing with hardware devices used by the ballot box on the Raspberry Pi 3 platform.

These include:

  • Pulse width modulation (PWM) control via pi-blaster or the RPi.GPIO Python library.
  • Servomotor control.
  • Barcode scanner control via a bundled C executable (scan).
